headline: How Boston Scientific's Surprise Setback Bolstered Edwards, Medtronic, Abbott
summary: Edwards Lifesciences stock jumped Wednesday after Boston Scientific said it would stop selling its rival heart-valve replacement systems.

raw.headline: How Boston Scientific's Surprise Setback Bolstered Edwards, Medtronic, Abbott
raw.summary: Edwards Lifesciences stock jumped Wednesday after Boston Scientific said it would stop selling its rival heart-valve replacement systems.

headline: Boston Scientific ends TAVR sales; J&J shares Monarch robot data
summary: Boston Scientific said it would halt worldwide sales of its Acurate devices due to “increased clinical and regulatory requirements.”

raw.headline: Boston Scientific ends TAVR sales; J&J shares Monarch robot data
raw.summary: Boston Scientific said it would halt worldwide sales of its Acurate devices due to “increased clinical and regulatory requirements.”
